text: Oltion Luli (18 August 1969) born in Shkodër he is a former Albanian athlete, who competed at the 2000 Summer Olympic Games in the Men's 100m he finished 8th in his heat and failed to advance. He was the Prefect of Shkodra region in 2005.Sports-Reference Profile He is member of Shkodra Municipality Council. ==References== * Category:Living people Category:1969 births Category:Sportspeople from Shkodër Category:Albanian male sprinters Category:Olympic athletes of Albania Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2000 Summer Olympics
title: Oltion Luli
